bibdata.title: IEEE Approved Draft Recommended Practice for Learning Technology
Open Archives Initiative Object Reuse and Exchange Abstract Model (OAI-ORE)
Mapping to the Conceptual Model for Resource Aggregation

IEEE Approved Draft Recommended Practice for Learning Technology - Open Archives Initiative Object Reuse and Exchange Abstract Model (OAI-ORE) - Mapping to the Conceptual Model for Resource Aggregation

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This recommended practice specifies how the elements and attributes defined in the Open Archives Initiative Object Reuse and Exchange (OAIORE) Abstract Model and expressed in the OAIORE Resource Map Implementation in RDF/XML relate to the components of the conceptual model for resource aggregation defined in IEEE Std 1484.13.1-2012.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: Open Archives Initiative Object Reuse and Exchange Abstract Model
